## Collection.Indexed.collect() method

Applies an `Option` valued mapper to each item in the collection, dropping the `None`<!-- -->s and unwrapping the `Some`<!-- -->s

**Signature:**

```typescript
collect<U>(mapper: Mapper<T, Option<U>, [index: number]>): Indexed<U>;
```
